> From: supercyclonus <supercyclonus@...>

 To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

ubject: Minions over the Black Fortress
> 
> 
> As the battle of Autobot vs=
 Decepticon, Maximal vs Predicon 
continued 
> to rage near the black Fortr=
ess - high over ahead, the same clouds 
> that originally disgorged Megatro=
n continued to roll and twist as 
> dark winds thrust through them, ripping=
 at them like some unseen 
> claws.
> 
> In eerie silence small motes of in=
ky blackness seemed to appear 
from 
> out of the broiling clouds. First on=
ly a few sprinkled amidst the 
> skies like soot, but then all too quickly =
they grew in both number 
> and size!
> 
> Then two bright lights seemed to=
 streak from the group, like 
shooting 
> stars bursting from amidst the cl=
ouds. As they passed through the 
> group the motes of black are briefly li=
t, revealing the distinctive 
> oblong shape of Scourge's hunters, trackers=
 and killers! Many 
> centuries from today humans will dare to call them so=
ap-dishes with 
> cannons, but today they have arrived and are intent upon =

destruction!
> 
> As the twin lights pass out into the open skies they onl=
y become 
> brighter and more powerful as their pod like shapes reveal thei=
r 
true 
> character: MISSILES!! Like twin suns they streak forward, direct=
ing 
> their destructive power down upon Hydras' base, even as the rest of =

> the approaching host continues inexorably onward!
> 
> The Minions have =
arrived!!!!
>
